name: Initial Outreach
subject: Quick question about {{company}}'s marketing strategy
content:
Hi {{name}},

I hope this email finds you well. I noticed {{company}} has been growing rapidly, and I'm curious about your current approach to lead generation.

At {{companyName}}, we've helped companies similar to {{company}} increase their qualified leads by 40-60% within the first quarter. I'd love to share some insights that might be relevant to your team.

Would you be open to a brief 15-minute call this week to discuss your current challenges and goals?

Best regards,
{{senderName}}
description: Perfect for reaching out to new prospects who haven't been contacted before.

name: Follow-up After Demo
subject: Thank you for your time, {{name}} - Next steps for {{company}}
content:
Hi {{name}},

Thank you for taking the time to join our demo yesterday. I enjoyed learning more about {{company}}'s goals and the challenges you're facing with your current lead management process.

As discussed, our platform could help you:
â€¢ Streamline your lead qualification process
â€¢ Increase conversion rates by 25-35%
â€¢ Save your team 10+ hours per week on manual tasks

I've attached a customized proposal based on our conversation. I'd be happy to schedule a follow-up call to address any questions and discuss implementation timelines.

What does your calendar look like for a 30-minute call this Friday?

Best regards,
{{senderName}}
{{companyName}}
description: Use this template after conducting a product demo or presentation.

name: Re-engagement Campaign
subject: {{name}}, is lead management still a priority for {{company}}?
content:
Hi {{name}},

I hope you're doing well! I wanted to reach out because it's been a while since we last spoke about {{company}}'s lead management needs.

I understand priorities can shift, but I wanted to check if streamlining your sales process is still something you're looking to address this quarter.

Since our last conversation, we've helped several companies in your industry:
â€¢ TechStart Inc. increased their lead conversion by 45%
â€¢ Growth Co. reduced their sales cycle by 30%
â€¢ Scale Solutions automated 80% of their lead qualification

If timing is better now, I'd love to show you some quick wins we could implement for {{company}}. Even a 10-minute call could provide some valuable insights.

Would you be interested in reconnecting?

Best,
{{senderName}}
description: Perfect for re-engaging leads who have gone cold or haven't responded in a while.

content:
